The first tome or volume of the Paraphrase of Erasmus vpon the Newe Testamente Paraphrases in Novum Testamentum. Vol. 1. English. 1548 Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536. Udall, Nicholas, 1505-1556.
1280 p. in various pagings.
Enpriented at London in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne by Edwarde Whitchurche, [London] : the last daie of Januarie, 1548 [31 Jan. 1548]
Translated from Latin by Nicholas Udall; includes text of Great Bible version of New Testament--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints. "Cum priuilegio Regali ad imprimendum solum." Signatures: A-P⁸ Q⁷ a-l⁸ m¹⁰ 2A-3A⁸ 3B⁹, ²3A-3O⁸ ²3P¹², ³3A-3K⁸ ³3L¹⁰. Pages numbered on recto only. Title within ornamental border. Marginal notes. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
=======

1280 p. in various pagings.
Enpriented at London in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne by Edwarde Whitchurche, [London] : the last daie of Januarie, 1548 [31 Jan. 1548]
Translated from Latin by Nicholas Udall; includes text of Great Bible version of New Testament--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints. "Cum priuilegio Regali ad imprimendum solum." Signatures: A-P⁸ Q⁷ a-l⁸ m¹⁰ 2A-3A⁸ 3B⁹, ²3A-3O⁸ ²3P¹², ³3A-3K⁸ ³3L¹⁰. Pages numbered on recto only. Title within ornamental border. Marginal notes. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.

London in Fletestrete at the signe of the Sunne
